name: Haiku
description:
The wisdom of the East applied to whatever subject you want.  Simply order a haiku, write your theme in the Paypal notes section, and your own custom haiku will be emailed to you within 24 hours!

All haikus are guarenteed to be 100% original, completely tailored to your subject, and can be emailed on as gifts or a secret romance.

name: Sonnet
description:
Get all Elizabethian on someone.  Perfect for wooing the woman (or man) in your life, Poetry to Go can tailor make a poetry with sweet, sweet words in the Shakesperian style.  

All sonnets adhere to the Shakesperian format, with sweet quatrains and gentle ending couplets sure to melt the heart of that special someone.

name: Short Poem
description:
Want to send sweet words of love, but need something of a little more substance than a Haiku?  Then the Short Poem is for you.  You can make it a short ode of sweet romance, a spiteful hate poem, a get well or congratulations missive that's tailored to you.   

Please specify on Paypal notes what the subject is, any important information, and a style preference if you want, and the poem will be emailed to you within 24-hours
